heading: Grid Dynamics
description: Primarily working as a frontend web developer. Contracted to work and support under other companies such as most recently Macys. Here I employ global best engineering practicies and primarily utilize cloud-based architectures

heading: National Commercial Bank Jamaica Limited
description: Worked as a software engineer primarly focus on supporting the bank's business elements. Worked on various software enhancements and bugfixes. Engineered a power app to assist with the deposit tracking process

heading: Seeds for the Future
description: Programme where participants learned about 5G, AI & Cloud Computing. Participants also created a project in line with the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

heading: Bloom Project
description: Programme where teams competed in an agile environment to create an application to present to investors. Here I lead the development process and scrum ceremonies in addition to helping the team with prototyping.

heading: Mona School of Business
description: Mainly a support role for students and staff. Here I assisted with troubleshooting hardware and software issues. I was also involved in various projects such as CSOD (Caribbean School of Data) & STATIN (Statistical Institute of Jamaica) digital classroom creation.
